title: 86/271/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 May 1986 amending Decision 81/525/EEC on applications for advances and refunds of premiums in connection with collective projects for the restructuring of vineyards
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 May 1986
amending Decision 81/525/EEC on applications for advances and refunds of premiums in connection with collective projects for the restructuring of vineyards
(86/271/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes II A and II B to Decision 81/525/EEC are hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 May 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 57, 29. 2. 1980, p. 27.
(2) OJ No L 163, 22. 6. 1983, p. 53.
(3) OJ No L 196, 18. 7. 1981, p. 11.

//  //  //  //  // (1)  State where appropriate, in brackets and in each of the columns concerned, the area of new plantings in hectares and fractions thereof.
(2) Attach the total area of plantings and replantings in wine-growing areas which, after the project, contain less than two restructured hectares.
(3) State in columns 6 and 8 the categories, within the meaning of Articles 29 and 29a of Council Regulation (EEC) No 337/79, as amended by Regulation No 454/80, to which the areas replanted or newly planted belong.
It is confirmed that:
(a) the premium was granted for the restructuring of vineyards producing table wine or suitable for producing quality wines psr, excluding the areas referred to in the first, second and third indents of Article 1 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 458/80, and in connection with a collective project approved by the Commission in accordance with Article 7 of that Regulation;
(b) the collective restructuring projects meet the conditions laid down in Article 2 (1) and (3) of that Regulation;
(c) the premium granted per hectare restructured, i. e. replanted or newly planted, does not exceed the limits laid down in Article 5 of that Regulation;
(d) the limits specified in Article 8 (1) of that Regulation, as amended by Regulation (EEC) No 1598/83, were complied with.
